DOC.criteria: Subjects must : Fever ( > 38Â°C ) ( time visit within previous 48 hrs history ) least two follow symptom : Chills/sweats Cough Dyspnea ( labor , difficult breathing ) Fatigue Headache Myalgia ( deep muscle ache ) Nasal congestion Runny nose Sore throat Patients undergoing treatment antiviral , within last 7 day include study .
